title: Avonturio
description: A 2D console rpg game with randomly generated dungeon and enemies
information: This was my first project outside of unity.
For a school asignment we had to make an rpg game in the console.
The requirement where simple: have a player, an enemy and a way to fight.
I wanted to challenge myself so i made a custom input system, dialogue system and output system.
I learnt alot about how visual studio works, debugging and how to structure a project without a game engine.
I'm quite thankfull for my school for giving me this assignment, it taught me alot.
